title: Service agreement and privacy policy
message:
Please carefully read and fully understand the terms of the 'service agreement' and 'privacy policy', including but not limited to: in order to better provide services to you, we need to collect your device identification, operation log and other information for analysis and optimization of application performance.
　　You can read《Service agreement》and《Privacy policy》Learn more. If you agree, please click the button below to start accepting our service.
